extendedInfo.description: WARNING! TOO ADDICTIVE TO PUT DOWN! In this juicy ninja game, your goal is to survive as long as possible while avoiding waves of melons, coconuts, oranges, lemons and the ultra rare dragon fruits! Use your ninja weapon arsenal to blow the fruits into tasty pieces! Yummy! 8bit is not alone in his quest, meet his friends each with unique abilities! Reviews:Â â Nominated by Toucharcade forums as Game of the Week.Â â "A game that typifies smartphone gaming at its best." - PocketGamer.co.ukÂ â "The game is extremely accessible and its touch controls are great." - TouchArcade.comÂ â "We loved 8bit Ninja and think it's a great game with fun retro graphics and extremely replayable." - SlideToPlay.comÂ â "You might just find it sneaking up and becoming your new iOS addiction." - GameZebo.comÂ â "Perfect for killing some time." - RazorianFly.comÂ Features include: -Simple and fun gameplay -Beautiful pixel art graphics -Addictive and tasty fruit slicing with various ninja weapons -Multiple characters to choose from, each with unique abilities -Earn XP while playing and level up your ninjas, just like a RPG! -Fun coin collecting to buy more weapons in the shop -Scoreloop leaderboards and achievements!-Super secret RETRO mode! Can you find it?

reviews.title: Simple quick fun = addicting
reviews.comment: Great game... Level progression is perfect. Items upgradable.. Different sceneries. Many characters.  Add more content!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game, but...
reviews.comment: It\'s fun, but after every round I get a black screen, and I either wait a minute for it to fix, or quit out and start again. Fix this, and then it gets 5 stars.
reviews.author: Patrick MacKinnon

reviews.title: Advertising in notification bar
reviews.comment: It seems like a fun enough game. But I won\'t support an app that pushes adverts to my phone. I\'m uninstalling the game now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Awesome game, better than most mother games except it seems like it would take you a while to get quite a bit of stuff. And... I just can\'t figure out how to collect words. Day the word is Hello. I can\'t pick up any letters including H. It\'s like that with any word. Hats, training... I think in then options section there should be a \'help\' section to act as a guide in case for forget or don\'t understand. Things to think about. Good job By the way!
reviews.author: Johnny Applecake

reviews.title: Simple yet very addictive
reviews.comment: ...but very buggy too. Frequent crashes, glitches here and there, but yet very entertaining
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best addictive game
reviews.comment: This is one of the best addictive games on market. The 8bit graphics reminds you of the old school games and the scoreloop app is handy. So go ahead and download and start loving the game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: I suppose for free its worth a try but it reminds me to much of my Commodore 64 from the 80\'s.  Only the Commodore was better.
reviews.author: Dave Graham

reviews.title: ADDICTIVE!!!
reviews.comment: 8bit ninja is probably the most addictive game I played so far excellent UI, and game feature keep the good work
reviews.author: Yolo Albert

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Don\'t get this game it is so stupid don\'t waste your Time I can\'t believe I got this game because it was that bad first off the controls need to be better and a little more complicated second the powersups need to be more effective then just working for 2 seconds. Third its just horrible don\'t get this game I tell you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The arrows controls are more reliable than the tilt, but I constantly press the home button on accident, maybe they can be configured, or closer to the middle. My final wish is that money accumulate faster, it\'s a bit slow to reach high numbers or I\'m just bad. ^_^ Great game though, such as simple concept!
reviews.author: Javier L.

reviews.title: Cool but...
reviews.comment: How do you get the letters cool but how you get the letters? that confuses me
reviews.author: Edson Guzman

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Love this game, its nice and simple but could add more features such as more ninjas ans buy ninjas witj couns not gems, could also make more power ups
reviews.author: nasim uddin

reviews.title: Hysterical!!!!!
reviews.comment: Reminds of old Jackie Chan movies where the actors are silly but have tremendous skill. Thanks devs! Hoping you earn enough $ to keep churning out clever titles!
reviews.author: freddy gonzalez

reviews.title: Well done!
reviews.comment: This is so quik easy and perfect for in the car and waiting for the bus and is a bit addictive but not overly wich gives players the chance to chill in this 8 bit action casual game  I hope every player keeps this awsome app good luck hope to see more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Charming
reviews.comment: The concept is simple, and it plays very well. The aesthetics are wonderful, and the game has more to offer than I thought it would. Everything seems very well balanced. Accumulating coins and dragon eggs takes a bit of time, but it\'s no problem at all when I play it every day to collect letters. Exceptionally well done.
reviews.author: Jay Haladyna

reviews.title: Unresponsive Ninja
reviews.comment: An endless swiping game with decent graphics (retro just means cheap.) The gameplay can be fun at times, but once again everything to unlock is just to expensive.   Replaying the game repeatedly to earn money is a chore. Make a free and a paid version. For endless \"whatever\" games, the game play better be engaging.  That is just not the case.  The fruit is barely near the character and it crushes him.  Cheap deaths occur constantly. Fun for a few minutes and uninstalled the next. Thanks.
reviews.author: Mark Toutant

reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised at it\'s quality
reviews.comment: great app. Has a few flaws, but still great. Why is it 8 bit ninja when the graphics are really 16-bit? Weird. Great app though. Might get old fast. But I was pleasantly surprised at it\'s quality, though.
reviews.author: Mark Stephens

reviews.title: Fix
reviews.comment: Black screen after every round on my galaxy tab
